TermsConditions.termsIntroTitle: OmniBazaar, Inc.'s Software Terms of Use
TermsConditions.termsIntro: Please read these Terms of Use carefully before using this Software offered by OmniBazaar, Inc. ("OmniBazaar", "us", "we"). These Terms of Use set forth the terms and conditions of our relationship and for the use of the OmniBazaar Software (the "Software") by you (“you”, “your”, “user”).
TermsConditions.termsIntroNotice: IMPORTANT NOTICE: THIS AGREEMENT CONTAINS AN ARBITRATION AGREEMENT, WHICH WILL REQUIRE YOU TO SUBMIT ANY CLAIMS YOU MAY HAVE AGAINST OMNIBAZAAR TO BINDING AND FINAL ARBITRATION.  IN ADDITION, UNDER THE ARBITRATION PROVISION, (A) YOU WILL ONLY BE PERMITTED TO PURSUE CLAIMS AGAINST OMNIBAZAAR ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS, NOT AS A PLAINTIFF OR CLASS MEMBER IN ANY CLASS OR REPRESENTATIVE ACTION OR PROCEEDING, AND (B) YOU WILL ONLY BE PERMITTED TO SEEK RELIEF (INCLUDING MONETARY, INJUNCTIVE, AND DECLARATORY RELIEF) ON AN INDIVIDUAL BASIS. BY ENTERING THIS AGREEMENT, YOU EXPRESSLY ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE READ AND UNDERSTAND ALL OF THE TERMS OF THIS AGREEMENT, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE SECTIONS REGARDING ARBITRATION.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware: The OmniBazaar Software (the "Software") is a free software program that performs the following functions:
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware1: 1. Create a peer-to-peer data-sharing network (the “OmniBazaar Marketplace Platform” or “Network”).
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware2: 2. Connect the user’s computer to that Network.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware3: 3. Allow individuals and businesses to buy and sell goods and services from each other.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware4: 4. Enable automated payment for purchases using OmniCoin and Bitcoin cryptocurrencies.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware5: 5. Reward users who provide services that benefit other users and the marketplace.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware6: 6. Distribute free OmniCoins to users who join and refer their friends.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware7: 7. Provide an escrow service that allows users to do business with other users that they do not know or trust.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftware8: 8. Track and use reputation and other information about users of the marketplace.
TermsConditions.omniBazaarSoftwareEnd: Track and use reputation and other information about users of the marketplace.
TermsConditions.omniCoinToken1: 1. OmniBazaar is conducting Token Sale Event (“Sale”) of its OmniBazaar Tokens, as further described in the OmniBazaar White Paper and the OmniBazaar Offering and/or Terms and Conditions Memorandum (collectively, the “Memorandum”.)
TermsConditions.omniCoinToken2: 2. You understand that the terms, conditions, and important disclosures and information regarding the Sale are set forth in the White Paper and the Memorandum.

TermsConditions.reviewingChanges1: 1. This Agreement applies to all users of the Software.
TermsConditions.reviewingChanges2: 2. OmniBazaar may make changes to this Agreement from time to time without specifically notifying you.
TermsConditions.reviewingChanges3: 3. OmniBazaar will post the latest Agreement on the Software, but it is up to you to review it before using the Software.
TermsConditions.reviewingChanges4: 4. If you continue to use the Software after any of these changes, your continued use will mean that you have accepted any changes to the Agreement.
TermsConditions.reviewingChangesEnd: In addition, some services offered through the Software may be subject to additional terms and conditions specified by OmniBazaar from time to time and your use of such services is subject to those additional terms and conditions, which are incorporated into this Agreement by this reference.

The following are your obligations when creating, registering, and maintaining the security and accuracy of your account:

TermsConditions.registrationAndAccount2: 2. You will create only one account for yourself.

TermsConditions.conductPoliciesTitle: You agree to comply with OmniBazaar’s conduct policies when using the Software
TermsConditions.conductPolicies1: 1. We do our best to keep the Software safe and operational, but we cannot guarantee it. We need your help to do that, which includes the following commitments:

TermsConditions.conductPolicies3: You will not decipher, decompile, disassemble, reverse engineer or otherwise attempt to derive any source code or underlying ideas or algorithms of any part of the Software, except to the limited extent applicable laws specifically prohibit such restriction;
TermsConditions.conductPolicies4: You will not interfere or attempt to interfere with the proper working of the Software or any activities conducted on the Software;

TermsConditions.conductPolicies6: You will not run any form of auto-responder or "spam" on the Software;
TermsConditions.conductPolicies7: You will not use manual or automated software, devices, or other processes to "crawl" or "spider" any page of the Software;

TermsConditions.conductPolicies9: You will not copy, rent, lease, distribute, or otherwise transfer any of the rights that you receive hereunder;
TermsConditions.conductPolicies10: You will not solicit passwords or personally identifying information (this includes, but is not limited to, someone else’s name, birth date, home address, IP address, credit card number, social security number, or other government-issued identification information) for commercial or unlawful purposes;

TermsConditions.conductPolicies13: You will not threaten, intimidate, or harass another user or any parties on or through the Software;
TermsConditions.conductPolicies14: You will not falsely represent your identity or impersonate a third party, nor will you falsify or mislead third parties regarding your affiliation with any entity;
